mapper.sql: id, locked, organization_id, password, salt, username, createtime, createuser, icon, modifytime, modifyuser, userno, status, superior, telephone, fromtype, breakfast, dinner, realname, isregist
mapper.select: select u.id, u.realname, u.telephone,o.name department_name,o1.name company_name, ow.am_hour,ow.am_minute,ow.pm_hour,ow.pm_minute from admin_user u left join admin_organization o on o.id=u.organization_id left join admin_organization o1 on o1.id=o.parent left join admin_org_worktime ow on o1.id = ow.org_id and ow.STATUS='Y' where o1.name is not null and u.telephone = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into admin_user (id, locked, organization_id, password, salt, username, createtime, createuser, icon, modifytime, modifyuser, userno, status, superior, telephone, fromtype, breakfast, dinner, realname, isregist) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{breakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dinner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isregist,jdbcType=INTEGER})

locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT},
organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
